title: Where are the new missions?
body:
**_Hiya pals, _**
I completed "The Light Rises." mission last night and haven't gotten any since. I read the event page on the website and it said that missions were updated every 24 hours at 11am, but I still have no new missions. Didn't think you had to buy the pass in order ( no pun intended ) to get more missions. Could just be a little behind but I would appreciate some feedback thank you. **:)**

replies.body: But it's not 11am yet.  :x  It's in pacific time and aimed to refresh around that time, so you gotta hang on just a little bit longer.
